TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A family of anticancer drugs that interfere with the growth of tumor cells by blocking the formation of deoxyribonucleotides (building blocks of DNA).

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "ribonucleotide reductase inhibitor"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "inhibidor de la ribonucleótido reductasa"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Familia de medicamentos contra el cáncer que interfieren en la multiplicación de las células tumorales al impedir la formación de desoxirribonucleótidos (elementos fundamentales del ADN).
